TopicTitle: Looking for a Time Control like mod

Articles.Content:
It looks like the Time Control mod has finally died. Was working up until about 1.0.2 but not any more.

Anyone know of another mod that will allow a really long burn (like 4 hours+) to be skipped through?

What does not work specifically? Because I am using it on 1.0.4.

There is one thing that comes to mind apart from that, but it has been outdated even longer than TimeControl. Orbit Manipulator theoretically allows thrust during on rails timewarp. Someone wanted to take it up some time ago, but you will have to test whether it works yourself.

Oh, when I tried it a few days ago it caused me to not be able to control craft. They just became stuck in place and I couldn't adjust their attitude etc.

I'll perhaps play about with it a bit more. Maybe it's clashing with another mod I'm using.
